org.tantalum.j2me

Class J2MEImageTypeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.storage.ImageTypeHandler
      • org.tantalum.j2me.J2MEImageTypeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataTypeHandler

    public final class J2MEImageTypeHandler
extends ImageTypeHandler
    This is a helper class for creating an image class. It automatically converts the byte[] to an Image as the data is loaded from the network or cache.

    • Method Detail

      • convertToUseForm

        public java.lang.Object convertToUseForm(byte[] bytes)
        Description copied from interface: DataTypeHandler
        Shift from binary to in-memory usable form. This may increase or decrease the total heap memory load, but in both cases it allows the RAM version to be rapidly returned without re-parsing the binary data. Every StaticCache must be assigned a DataTypeHandler
        Returns:
